front.title: NETCONF Extensions to Support List Pagination

abstract.t: This document defines a mapping of the list pagination mechanism defined in [I-D.wwlh-netconf-list-pagination] to NETCONF [RFC6241]. This document updates [RFC6241], to augment the <get> and <get- config> "rpc" statements, and [RFC8526], to augment the <get-data> "rpc" statement, to define input parameters necessary for list pagination.
